QuestData.Title: Rotten at the Roots
QuestData.Description:
Underneath Kypari Kor is a large chamber where the mantid tend to the tree. That must be where the source of the corruption lies.
We need to get into that chamber and stop them. N'Zoth must not be allowed to empower the swarm.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop the source of the corruption within the Morrowchamber.
